alert.note: Alert for Chouteau; Hill; Liberty (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 04 at 2:02AM MDT until September 04 at 3:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Great Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Liberty County in north central Montana... Hill County in north central Montana... Northeastern Chouteau County in north central Montana... * Until 300 AM MDT. * At 201 AM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 33 miles northwest of Joplin to 10 miles southeast of Chester to near Fort Benton, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Chester, Big Sandy, Azure, Beaver Creek, Inverness, St. Pierre, Gildford, Joplin, Sangrey, Boneau, Box Elder, Agency, Hingham, Rudyard, Rocky Boy, Laredo, Kenilworth, Kremlin and Simpson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
